Scripting.Code: function m dim version dim allowRetake version = cp.site.getInteger( "Distance Learning Revision" ) if version < 3 then ' ' upgrade quiz data to version 3 ' allowretake = cp.site.getBoolean( "DISTANCELEARNINGRETAKE", "1" ) call cp.db.executeSql( "update quizzes set typeId=1,requireAuthentication=1,allowRetake=" & cp.db.encodeSqlBoolean( allowretake )) end if if version < 5 then ' ' upgrade quiz data to version 5 ' call cp.db.executeSql( "update quizAnswers set name=aText" ) call cp.db.executeSql( "update quizQuestions set name=qText" ) call cp.db.executeSql( "delete from ccproperties where name='IndexConfig:" & cp.content.getId("quiz questions") & "'" ) call cp.db.executeSql( "delete from ccproperties where name='IndexConfig:" & cp.content.getId("quiz answers") & "'" ) end if call cp.site.setProperty( "Distance Learning Revision", "5" ) end function
function m m = cclib.getLoginForm() if m="" then call main.redirect( "#" ) end if end function

function m dim cs dim quizId dim quizQuestionId dim pageList dim sql ' m = "" quizQuestionId = cp.doc.getInteger( "recordId" ) set cs = cp.csNew() ' if cs.open( "quiz questions", "id=" & quizQuestionId ) then quizId = cs.getInteger( "quizid" ) end if call cs.close() ' pageList = "" call cp.db.executeSql( "update quizQuestions set pageOrder=0 where pageOrder is null" ) sql = "select pageOrder,count(id) as cnt from quizQuestions where (quizid=" & quizId & ") group by pageOrder" m = m & "
" & sql if cs.openSql( sql ) then do while cs.ok pageList = pageList & "," & cs.getInteger("pageOrder") call cs.goNext() loop pagelist = mid( pagelist, 2 ) end if call cs.close() ' sql = "update quizzes set pageList=" & cp.db.encodeSqlText( pagelist ) & " where id=" & quizId call cp.db.executeSql( sql ) m = m & "
" & sql ' m = "" end function

Addon.name: Online Quiz Includes

Field.Name: Name
Field.Caption: Name
Field.HelpDefault: The name of the quiz. This name is used to select the quiz on a page so if if changes, be sure to reselect the new name on the page that include the online quiz add-on.

Field.Name: Questions
Field.Caption: Quiz Questions
Field.HelpDefault: Each quiz contains one or more questions. This is a link to the questions for this quiz.

Field.Name: Video
Field.Caption: Legacy Video Link
Field.HelpDefault: When included, a video can be presented at the beginning of each quiz.

Field.Name: Subject
Field.Caption: Subject (ignore)
Field.HelpDefault: Each quiz can optionally be assigned a subject. When a subject is assigned, the quiz score(s) are tallied by subject.

Field.Name: customTopCopy
Field.Caption: Custom Instructions
Field.HelpDefault: If included, this copy will replace the default instructions at the top of the first quiz page. It will not appear on additional pages.

Field.Name: customButtonCopy
Field.Caption: Custom Button Instructions
Field.HelpDefault: If included, this copy will replace the default copy above the save and submit buttons

Field.Name: allowCustomButtonCopy
Field.Caption: Use Custom Button Instructions
Field.HelpDefault: If checked, the default instructions right above the submit and save buttons will be replaced with the Custom Button Instructions below.

Field.Name: allowCustomTopCopy
Field.Caption: Use Custom Instructions
Field.HelpDefault: If checked, the default instructions at the top of the first quiz page will be replaced with the Custom Instructions below.

Field.Name: allowRetake
Field.Caption: Allow Re-Take
Field.HelpDefault: When checked, the quiz taker can repeat the quiz as many times as they choose. All results are saved.

Field.Name: studyCopy
Field.Caption: Study Material
Field.HelpDefault: The optional study material for the quiz

Field.Name: includeStudyPage
Field.Caption: include Study Page
Field.HelpDefault: When checked, the study material copy below will be presented as the first page of the quiz with a continue button.

Field.Name: typeId
Field.Caption: Type of Quiz
Field.HelpDefault: Graded Quizzes have multiple choice answers with one answer marked correct. When the quiz taker is finished, the quiz will be scored. If subjects are included with each question, each subject is graded individually and results in a letter grade.With a Points-Based quiz, each answer includes a point value. When the quiz taker is finished, the quiz points are totaled and results page is created for them.

Field.Name: requireAuthentication
Field.Caption: Requires Login
Field.HelpDefault: When checked, the user must be logged in to take the quiz. If they are not, instead of the quiz they will see the site's login form.

Field.Name: Name
Field.Caption: Question Text
Field.HelpDefault: (for internal use) This is the name for this question and does not appear in the public quiz. Use a short name you will recognize.

Field.Name: Active
Field.Caption: Active
Field.HelpDefault: Uncheck Active removes the question from the Quiz temporarily

Field.Name: QuizID
Field.Caption: Quiz
Field.HelpDefault: The quiz with which this question will be included.

Field.Name: QOrder
Field.Caption: Order On The Page
Field.HelpDefault: (Optional) To order your questions on a page, include an integer number here. Questions without numbers will be first, followed by questions sorted in accending order.

Field.Name: QText
Field.Caption: Legacy Question Text
Field.HelpDefault: The actual question as it will appear on the quiz.

Field.Name: Answers
Field.Caption: Answers
Field.HelpDefault: Each question can have one or more answer. After a quiz question is created, this is a link to the answers for this question.

Field.Name: SubjectID
Field.Caption: Subject
Field.HelpDefault: (optional) Use subjects to divide your quiz questions into groups and to provide a letter grading system for automatic grading.

Field.Name: pageOrder
Field.Caption: Page
Field.HelpDefault: (optional) If you wish to have multiple pages, include an integer number here. No page number will be displayed, but questions with the same number will be displayed together and the lowest page number will be displayed first. Questions without a page number will be displayed before questions with page numbers.

Field.Name: Name
Field.Caption: Answer Text
Field.HelpDefault: This is the answer as it will appear on the quiz.

Field.Name: Correct
Field.Caption: Is the Correct Answer?
Field.HelpDefault: For Graded Quizzes, check this box to score this answer correct.

Field.Name: AText
Field.Caption: Legacy Answer Text
Field.HelpDefault: The description shown on the public site for this answer.

Field.Name: QOrder
Field.Caption: Order within Question
Field.HelpDefault: The numeric order this answer should appear with other answers for this question

Field.Name: QuestionID
Field.Caption: Quiz Question
Field.HelpDefault: The question to which this answer applies.

Field.Name: points
Field.Caption: Points
Field.HelpDefault: For Points-Based quizes, this is how many points will be earned by selecting this answer to the question.

Field.Name: Name
Field.Caption: Name
Field.HelpDefault: A record name to help identify this response.

Field.Name: MemberID
Field.Caption: Member
Field.HelpDefault: The user that created this response.

Field.Name: QuizID
Field.Caption: Quiz
Field.HelpDefault: The quiz for this response.

Field.Name: Score
Field.Caption: Score
Field.HelpDefault: For quizzes set to Grade-Score, this is the total score.

Field.Name: attemptNumber
Field.Caption: Attempt Number
Field.HelpDefault: If the quiz allows re-take, this is the number of the quiz taken by this user.

Field.Name: dateSubmitted
Field.Caption: Date Submitted
Field.HelpDefault: If this response completed all the pages and submitted, this is the date and time of the submission.

Field.Name: totalQuestions
Field.Caption: Total Questions
Field.HelpDefault: After submission, the total questions and total correct answers are calculated.

Field.Name: totalCorrect
Field.Caption: Total Correct
Field.HelpDefault: After submission, the total questions and total correct answers are calculated.

Field.Name: lastDisplayedPageOrder
Field.Caption: Page Order Last Displayed
Field.HelpDefault: When Study Page Last Displayed is not checked, this is the last page displayed during this response. Page orders are set within each question.

Field.Name: lastDisplayedStudyPage
Field.Caption: Study Page Last Displayed
Field.HelpDefault: When checked, the page this user last viewed was the study page.

Field.Name: dateStarted
Field.Caption: Date Started
Field.HelpDefault: This is the date and time that the quiz started. The study page is not included.

Field.Name: Name
Field.Caption: Name
Field.HelpDefault: The name of the quiz subject. This name appears in the scoring summary

Field.Name: FCaption
Field.Caption: F
Field.HelpDefault: Captions for grades displayed on the scoring page.

Field.Name: DPercentile
Field.Caption: D
Field.HelpDefault: This grade will be assigned if the overall score exceeds this percentage correct.

Field.Name: CPercentile
Field.Caption: C
Field.HelpDefault: This grade will be assigned if the overall score exceeds this percentage correct.

Field.Name: BPercentile
Field.Caption: B
Field.HelpDefault: This grade will be assigned if the overall score exceeds this percentage correct.

Field.Name: APercentile
Field.Caption: A
Field.HelpDefault: This grade will be assigned if the overall score exceeds this percentage correct.

Field.Name: DCaption
Field.Caption: D
Field.HelpDefault: Captions for grades displayed on the scoring page.

Field.Name: BCaption
Field.Caption: B
Field.HelpDefault: Captions for grades displayed on the scoring page.

Field.Name: ACaption
Field.Caption: A
Field.HelpDefault: Captions for grades displayed on the scoring page.

Field.Name: CCaption
Field.Caption: C
Field.HelpDefault: Captions for grades displayed on the scoring page.
